_header: The first token against doomsday as our lord said
Note: Part of the concluding section of 4196 occuring separately; follows 4622; also cf. 6345.
_description: The Fifteen Signs of the Judgment, in one MS of the South English Legendary — seventy-eight lines

CamTCC605.First Lines:
Þa furst tokne aȝen domes day as oure lorde sedehongur
                    schal in londe be trechery & falshede…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Bydde we god þat ous deme schal þat king is of alle
                    kingeþat amonge his blessed sones to rest oure soules
                    bringe
CamTCC605.Attributed Title:
xv toknes (RT, f. 188); Deþes Indicciones (RT: f.
                    188v)
CamTCC605.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.
         https://mss-cat.trin.cam.ac.uk/Manuscript/R.3.25.
